author: Rynae M
comment: Whats the point of tracking your runs if you can't put in your time by the seconds. How am I supposed to pr or track any progress. I'm hating the update that got rid of inputting seconds.

author: Aaron Steinke
comment: Great app for me!!! Love it

author: Mark Scranton
comment: Worked well for me.

author: Sameera Kaka
comment: Love it

Needs work. Takes forever to sync with other UA apps, including MyFitnessPal, on my phine, and their sister apps on my SGear. UA makes billions in gear sales, invest more into the foundations. I'm not buying "smart shoes" if the app takes an hour to sync with them.

author: Mark Lim
comment: Was using it on previous phone with no issues..  Download it on my new phone and the mapping was horrible..  After the first try with it, app shows 0.12km in 14 mins. 2nd run was 0.18 in 12mins... Going over to other apps...

author: Seth Difley
comment: This app, while free of charge to install, constantly nags the user to upgrade to premium. The user interface leaves much to be desired. Every other time the app is accessed, the experience is interrupted with an irrelevant advertisement. The one nice thing about this app is that it notifies me when a friend has posted a workout. That one nice thing isn't worth seeing the irrelevant ads.

author: Sandor Berghoffer
comment: So I use this for runs and it tracks your course well. The only coaching I  have heard is it tells me 1 mile splits. I have not experimented with the app to see how much it can do though.

author: Jamie Cousineau
comment: Great app, tracking the route in real time has gotten great since a couple years back. The workout breakdown is so handy.i like that you can switch to walking or biking in the same app so as to keep all the cardio in one spot. I think they also have weight lifting activity recording.

author: Suzy Gang Kopik
comment: This app has been great on old phone, but not syncing properly with Huawei P8 lite 2017... So all stats worthless now... will prob unload app if can't sort it...

author: Jonathan Love
comment: There's several things about this app that i love, but there's more that i don't. To start, the cost. I'd also like to see a workout rollup totaling the last week's, month's, year, and year to date.

author: Danny Briscoe
comment: Its a decent app, it does what its supposed to (most of the time) its had the odd hiccup when tracking rus in the past, seems to have steadied itself now. I'd ideally like to see maps of your routes, without street names, so people cant see where I live if I post routes onlie etc

author: Hj O
comment: Sometimes shuts off in the middle of my workout. Has given me very inaccurate distance readings.  Seems to work sometimes.

author: Charlie Frayer
comment: 1st time user. Gave me verbal updates on distance, splits, and pace at each mile mark via my wireless headphones and with Google play music playing.
GPS is not accurate. It's dropping half a mile on my 3 mile route. Other than that, it's good. Easy to use and has more extras than I'll ever need.

author: Chris Maroon
comment: You can't actually manually map your own run. You can only use a pre selected route. If you can't simply map a random run you just did and this app is called map my run, then there is something fundamentally wrong
For a few weeks now have not been able to access workouts.  All it does is go to error page which you have to close to leave

author: Sean Fox
comment: The auto pause is very useful when using the app on the phone, I have recently started using the app on the Samsung Gear fit 2 pro, there is no auto pause feature available, can this be looked at please

author: Kandy Luv
comment: I love this app. It records your routes. You can record your food and water intake. You can listen to your favorite music while this app works in the background. It tells you how many miles you've completed and an average on how many calories you lost. I recommend this app to all my friends and anyone that is looking for a great tracker
This app motivates me to find new running spots. My fitness watch isn't always accurate, so this app helps a lot!

author: Christopher Collier
comment: The app is fantastic.  I have no problems using the free version.  In addition to running, it has modes for bicycling and other activities. I highly recommend this app for athletes at all levels.

author: Matthew Hesson-McInnis
comment: Crashes, doesn't allow Gear to pause workout or display stats, crappy gear app with terrible GPS accuracy

author: Debbie Ivey
comment: My miles are always a lot less than the people that I run with so this app is terrible for keeping accurate time

author: Kevin Hynes
comment: Great running app. Have used for more than 2 years with no hiccups on Android phone. Easy to set up and use. Would recommend to anyone for walking, biking, running or any outdoor activity. I also use it while vacationing in Mexico.
Don't use very often but when I do, it's awesome to see my progress!!

author: Julie-Anne England
comment: Love this app! Great for motivating my runs and i love how it tracks your route so you can redo certain tracks later.

author: Amy Rether
comment: I've always liked this app. It's been a few years since I had wifi or data access to use it. (Yes, there are pockets of the country like that.) This app has workout categories others don't. It is easy to use. I like that I can plan and set goals. Four stars only because it requires internet service and I don't have that 5-6 mos out of the year and I am loosing my VIP membership.

author: Ryan Hill
comment: Very poor didn't track my run said I was running through gardens to get to the place I was running rather than the path.. ps the path is longer.
It is a very simple to use application for different activities. I compared with other tracking devices in parallel and it was accurate. Nice way to present workout summary and history

author: je njr
comment: Doesn't sync workouts with samsung health even it though it is a partner app. I thought I can solve the problem with a workaround, sync the workout to myfitnesspal then to shealth. But it didn't work either! You can't even make your own apps to work with each other!

LOVE this app! It's been a few years since I've used it(several new phones and what not) but i forgot how helpful it is. I was in the best shape of mg life when i had used it and I'm about to be in even better shape now. Strong strong strong 🔥
Best free running app out there. The challenges are a great way to stay motivated.

author: Adam Ripley
comment: Does what it's supposed to and with few errors. Doesn't seem to sync well with Fitbit watches, but I'm not sure if that's an error with this app or the watch.

author: Wes Griggs
comment: Great app. Easy to use. And easy to pair with other apps like my fitness pal

author: Summy_Sunshine_11
comment: Love how I can use a fitness app that tracks my distance when I run on a treadmill with the HOVR shoes

author: Martha Rosborough
comment: This is my go to app, and an excellent motivator that not only gets me out there, but keeps going.. absolutey love it !!!

author: tyler heal
comment: Sometimes doesn't seem to give audio when the workout starts as I use a delay or tell me split km times which is frustrating as I'm trying to get my pace right.

author: The6foot9
comment: Does the job well, better than most. Update: still does the trick.

author: Peter Spung
comment: Does the job I hired it to do: track the time of my outdoor workouts and the terrain covered while running, riding, or walking.
Great app even in free version. So go I may even pay to upgrade...
